message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our top-of-the-line product to you. This unique item has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. We believe it could significantly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional features and benefits, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $2000000. We look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I'm interested in the product, I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $1400000 for it. I believe this is a fair price considering its features and benefits. Can you consider this offer?

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a revised price of $1650000 for the product. This price reflects the high-quality materials, advanced technology, and unique features that distinguish our product from others in the market. I hope this offer aligns better with your budget while still ensuring a fair return for us. Let me know if this proposal works for you.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $1500000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the features and benefits, and I'm hoping you can meet me in the middle. Can you consider this offer?
